Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: No trains between Howard and Belmont
ShortDescription: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a medical emergency.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th- bound Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between Howard and Belmont due to a medical emergency.

As a result, trains are operating only between Belmont and 95th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Belmont provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Howard bound Red Line Trains are running buy are bypassing Berwyn.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Purple Line Delays
ShortDescription: Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at Berwyn. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Purple Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at Berwyn. 

Shuttle buses are available from Howard to Belmont to provide connecting service through the affected area.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
